sub_title: Agricultural Counsellor for Indonesia, Malaysia and Singapore at Ministry of LNV · ‎Dutch Ministry of Agriculture, Nature and Food Quality
summary:
Experience
• formulation, implementation and management of development projects in sustainable agriculture and water management in Africa and South America. 
• education/training of GIS in the Netherlands for (non) governmental institutes. 
• information management within the government and improving the quality of work at the main levels of the ministry.
• international consultancy and project management  
• disaster management

Skills
• team player with an open eye for counselling and coaching. 
• able to bring people from one or more organizations together and to motivate and inspire them to come up with new ideas, possibilities and insights. 
• a strong conceptual and strategic analytical capacity to understand information systems and business operational issues in order to analyse and evaluate critical matters and to make the appropriate match. 
• always looking for solutions, pragmatic if necessary and a strong persistence and commitment
• remain calm in stressful situations 
• innovative, flexible, customer friendly, and excellent interpersonal and communication skills and a good judgment of character
